description: bab bel is at the center of language learning revolution we defined the market for online language learning and today our product is available worldwide across multiple platforms our customer base is broad diverse and passionate about language learning we re about to embark on an exciting new journey to change the way people learn and are looking for the best talents in the industry to get us there you re natural champion for the user and move with ease between the worlds of business tech logy and consumer needs you re communicator versed at leading cross disciplinary international teams in solving real world problems and needs if you re strategic thinker with knack for details an entrepreneurial self do er afraid to get your hands dirty to get job done we want to hear from you in return we offer fantastic opportunity to evolve within dynamic and fast growing environment and of course you ll be working on product that improves the lives of millions of people this is full time role based in the heart of buzzing berlin germany responsibilities scope define and drive the evolution of bab bel cross platform product experience based on user needs and requirements define manage and execute product road map and release schedule acting as partner between engineering marketing and business development to ensure that deliverable are understood projects and features prioritized and successfully delivered own product backlog as product owner and specify product requirements using user centered experience driven specification methodologies such as user flows and bdd styled user stories work in scrum teams with engineers design didactic data analyst and user research team in understanding defining executing and measuring new product opportunities determine best methods to test potential solutions and gather feedback including market analysis competitive benchmarking identification of partner and consumer needs influence the product strategy with other seniors and directors and manage key strategic initiatives if required across multiple teams establish shared vision across the company by building consensus and creating buy in on priorities leading to product execution work closely with marketing and business development to position and promote products as well as develop partner strategies requirements minimum seven years product management experience with demonstrated ability to drive product decisions lead cross disciplinary teams and timely delivery of outstanding products strong product and service with the ability to construct both big picture and detailed road maps advocating stake holder needs and business impact extensive experience and skills in gathering requirements understanding user needs defining functional specifications in the form of bdd styled user stories wire frames and user flows to communicate your ideas to design engineering and operational teams proven skills in defining and upholding product and design frameworks ideally with experience in designing platform solutions well versed and highly experienced with in agile product development philosophy and processes proven track record in the end to end delivery of cross platform solutions on time and within budget proven creative problem solving and analytical in vative mindset excellent interpersonal and communication skills in fluent english both written and spoken ability to lead multiple interdisciplinary and international teams to drive internal consensus and common goals highly organised self motivated worker with entrepreneurial passion and ability to effectively multi task ready to coach and manage less experienced product owners bonus wledge and experience in education health or other related areas bonus startup entrepreneurial experience benefits you will change the way of learning for millions of users worldwide great product and highly motivated team that wants to push boundaries potential description: join fun global team of top engineers seasoned entrepreneurs and taxi drivers for the adventure of lifetime we are changing personal transportation making people lives easier and opening up multi billion dollar market in the process we ve built massive following in london dublin spain and singapore with both drivers and passengers thrilled to finally have great experience with cabs join us as we expand globally the role we are looking for and talented engineer hungry for solving business problems and excited to work in one of the most impressive platforms in the business we are all about micro services aw and serious scale we want our engineers to move comfortably between product and platform development and our senior and tech leads to have the vision to see what is coming before anyone else the flagship of our stack is our state of the art micro service platform go rabbit zookeeper cassandra sq mem cached and java form the backbone of our tech logy our web stack includes javascript react some angular php and mysql add to that puppet jenkins continuous integration and lot of automated tests with selenium and cucumber and you got the picture we deal with lot of tech logies requirements if you are an excellent developer you are half way there wing go lang is the ultimate goal but if you are proficient in java or any top language we trust you can pick up go in flash experience in the following areas and tech logies are all welcomed go cassandra web services and micro service oriented architecture messaging and locking patterns zero rabbit sq zookeeper etc passion for maintainable extensible and reusable code as well as fast iteration solid understanding of data structures and algorithms on the soft side we expect you to lead some young and very bright developers imparting on them your wisdom your wledge of best practices and that perfect mix of just getting things done and doing it the right way benefits competitive salary with stock options flexible working we strongly believe in work life balance two five days paid holidays great gear we love apple computers and big monitors two if required and what about us hail is the evolution of the hail free smartphone app which puts people just two taps away from licensed vehicle and lets drivers get more passengers when they want them hail hail is accepted around the world every two seconds from hail global network of over six zero zero zero zero drivers and more than million passengers launched in vember two zero one one hail has carried over twenty million passengers and grown to annual zed sales of well over one zero zero founded by three taxi drivers and three internet entrepreneurs hail has raised one zero zero from the best investors anywhere including union square ventures acc el partners wellington partners atomic ventures and sir richard branson hail is available as free download from the itunes app store and google play simply search on hail

description: we re looking for senior designer to join our award winning team and help us deliver wide range of projects across digital social print content and everything in between for our uk and global clients this is hands on role working within collaborative environment to develop conceptual campaigns set visual directions create designs collaborate on interactive outputs and invent amazing products big thinking forward thinking we re after true designer at heart who wants to produce work that is usable intuitive intelligent and enjoyable we re looking for designers who live and breathe their passion and want to do it through the day instead of just on weekends you care about attention to detail and you realise that each and every piece of your work represents who you are we believe in strongly collaborative environment and we re looking for strong visual designer advocate in the team able to articulate complex principles and conceptual ideas simply both verbally and visually we will need you to have strong communication and collaboration skills you will be immediately immersed into high energy environment where you will need to be confident and look for ways to constantly be challenged we re looking for those who aren afraid of taking the next step into the unk wn there sitting back on your laurels you will be taking high participatory role within our creative team to deliver real briefs for real clients you will have keen eye for detail be able to follow process and desire to learn and develop your skills as well as getting stuck in when it required we promise to challenge you daily to grow both professionally and personally you will be supported by design leads and the creative director and will be fully encouraged to grow your skills base in continuous learning environment this role is empowering scary exhilarating and everything in between come join super friendly creative team who are creating amazing work for big brands and having laugh doing it all besides seeing your work out there at global level will always give you goose bumps what we like to see four years or more experience in creating beautiful digital interfaces touch screen applications and real world deliverable solid wledge of design processes methodologies and best practice principles ability to multi task and stay organised to meet multiple deadlines across variety of projects capable of the drive and motivation to achieve perfection in themselves and others whilst balancing the practicalities of agency life ability to present simply both eloquently in internal and external presentations as well as in all visual communication belief in risk taking design always pushing beyond the expected solution and making something you would love to use wledge and awareness of facebook twitter vine snap chat insta gram youtube and other social media channels aware of development techniques jquery html five css etc in order to achieve their creative vision passion and desire to produce the best experience for user matter the channel or device and commitment to ensure it achieved throughout the project life cycle

description: the role we re looking for talented and passionate designer to join our seven person design team and contribute to our style guide iterate design changes and implement design principles across our entire platform as we scale as level ii designer you will have an impact on all aspects of the product lifecycle and you ll work to map user flows build high fidelity prototypes and oversee the development process you ll also have the opportunity to collaborate across different projects and teams from dashboard work flows for our student ambassadors to analytics tools for our product managers to occasional marketing campaigns and wherever else you like to take the lead here are some of the challenges you ll take on tackle complex problems and provide elegant creative solutions that respectfully balance both business and user needs create interactions across various media including web mobile and email and develop working prototypes in html css and javascript produce sketches flowchart mind maps wire frames mock ups prototypes and other designs as you iterate toward the best solutions to ux ui challenges lead usability testing with the product team for the ui that you will be building actively researching and staying abreast of interaction design and relevant tech logy trends mentor and train other members of the design team our ideal candidate has two years of professional experience designing web mobile or other user centered application for web based education gaming or commerce product strong design skills in photoshop and illustrator and other tools in adobe creative suite strong experience with rapid prototyping and professional experience with html css and javascript portfolio that showcases interaction and visual design projects user research and strong grasp of design principles strong understanding of the product life cycle as well as user centered design processes and methods bachelor or master degree in interaction design graphic design digital media or related field bonus points for some experience in css pre processors and angular js self initiated side projects in your portfolio experience in user research and usability test practical wledge of web ios and or android development what we re offering you industry competitive salary and stock options full medical coverage medical dental vision four zero one program to help you save for the future regularly planned team events and outings free friday lunches and an endless snack and drink supply on site amenities including day spa full service cafeteria three miles of nature walks along the bay and free membership to seven five zero zero sq ft fitness center about us course hero is creating platform where students and experts can share and access great academic content they need to succeed at any time from anywhere today millions of students take advantage of our educational resources including study guides flash cards and tutors we believe that improved access to wledge enriches lives and increases future opportunities tech logy is revolutionizing the way we learn and we re committed to providing individualized support to students everywhere to help them expand their academic wledge and professional skills our company culture is very open flat and transparent we succeed and learn together we ve tried hard to make this pleasant and inspiring place to do creative work and it been working since we started out in two zero zero eight most importantly we seek to hire individuals whose personality integrity and passion for our business make our team better as whole we re growing fast profitable yes it true for four years and counting and looking for new team members to push us toward the future check out these videos to learn more about our company culture and our company mission

description: about us headquartered in new york and with offices in three states home team transforms the in home care and aging experience by providing clients with personalized care planning expert caregiver matching custom mobile tech logy and proactive care management to improve older adults health and well being while giving their families peace of mind in order to support the home team mission we are building team of experienced engineers to create software that will improve the lives of seniors caregivers and others in the home care ecosystem there is work that is both straightforward and more fundamentally complex about you you are interested in only writing software but helping to build company you have the empathy and communication skills necessary to build strong relationships with colleagues on different teams to solve fundamental business problems you understand the fundamentals of computer science you might have relevant degree from good school but description: twi lio is looking to hire the director of marketing for pac the individual will be instrumental in launching twi lio marketing in the asia pacific region the ideal candidate must be proven leader with track record of success in breakthrough tech logy marketing to drive hyper growth in the pac markets about the job the director of marketing for pac will be reporting into the vp of global marketing you will be part of both the twi lio marketing team in san francisco and the pac team based in hong kong and singapore this role demands steep learning curve around the company products market customers and competition it needs leader driven by passion to make twi lio successful has the entrepreneurial mindset to get things done is motivated to lead by example and will create valuable relationships both internally and externally for twi lio you have defined role but in true startup style the working environment is ultra dynamic you will need to be someone that thrives in very fluid environment eager to roll up your sleeves to diy and regularly work outside of your comfort zone you are obsessed with making twi lio wildly successful in the region pulling out all the stops to make that happen this is nine to five monday to friday job and you relish that you will be working across multiple twi lio teams including product pr community developer evangelism channel sales business development and recruitment responsibilities you will own and execute all aspects of marketing and pr for twi lio in the asia pacific region you will be expected to formulate compelling ways to connect with your identified customers in the region and figure out how twi lio can address their pain points you will be measured on building brand loyalty and product advocacy among our customers and to use that to help bring new customers into the funnel and have them adopt twi lio for the long term you will define the marketing team in the region as marketing leader you will be responsible for building managing and coaching high performance marketing team to expand twi lio marketing activities in the region over time the marketing team in pac starts with you the work include lead all aspects of the marketing initiatives for the region together with the marketing team in san francisco to raise twi lio profile and launch twi lio products in the region build highly effective marketing plan to drive demand generation revenue public relations content marketing web media content marketing events and brand awareness in pac plan and execute twi lio hosted events such as our signature signal event signal twi lio com twi lio road shows seminars and workshops partner with sales to translate the strategic marketing plan into actionable quarterly targets and initiatives to achieve financial objectives coordinate strategic marketing partnerships including discovering the right local partners and maximizing the relationship benefits for both parties speak publicly and represent twi lio at various external events requirements at least one zero years of hands on marketing experience in the tech logy sector or startup environment in the asia pacific region proficiency in english is must added proficiency in mandarin japanese korean is plus you are proven doer you have led successful marketing campaigns either social pr online field product etc engaged the press and organized large and small events meet ups parties outings conferences trade shows hack th on etc with demonstrable results you are all about getting things done you get tech logy our customers are big enterprises and developers who often speak in jargon and you can gro what they re saying you are self starter and can operate in remote role with little day to day supervision you re world class communicator both over the phone and via email you can hold your own when speaking to mass audience or engaging the press one to one you are team player but can also work independently make decisions and are afraid to work without safety net you have achieved with limited resources you understand roi and how to effectively apply it to everything you do you have flexible attitude in regards to work such as supporting evening and weekend events travelling as required bonus points you are super passionate about twi lio mission to diseniorupt communications and have deep understanding of twi lio is value proposition you have worked with communications before and how they work you understand voip sip web rt video messaging and great quality communication experiences you have worked with tech logy products that have targeted enterprises and developers with cloud based services via evangelism direct online and channel strategies you can build twi lio app yourself degree from competitive university in marketing or focused on writing software or words either is good about us twi lio makes communications easy and powerful with twi lio is platform businesses can make communications relevant and contextual by embedding real time communication and authentication capabilities directly into their software applications twi lio gives businesses the ability to in vate prototype create and connect with their customers at the right time and in the right way founded in two zero zero eight twi lio is privately held and based in san francisco california with other offices around the world twi lio is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer we are committed to equal opportunity regardless of race color ancestry religion gender gender identity parental or pregnancy status national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital status disability or veteran status and operate in compliance with the san francisco fair chance ordinance li post

description: we are looking for an senior ios developer full time to start immediately in our office in berlin germany who we are with millions of regular users and more than nine zero zero zero hours of premium content bab bel com is growing fast while shaping the future of learning we defined the market for online language learning and today our product is available worldwide across multiple platforms how we work our agile delivery teams are working in full stack and feature teams involving disciplines from product management user interface design user experience research analytics and engineering due to the growth our multi team environment is scaling fast while we are adopting agile values management and engineering practices who we are looking for you are passionate experienced and pragmatic ios engineer who has proven skills in creating in vative apps with modern and elegant user interfaces you have strong knack for problem solving and want to change the future of language learning while working in challenging environment working together with ambitious colleagues you are eager to collaborate and dive into different disciplines to broaden your wledge in other fields of expertise as well as share your own contributing to great architecture and building the base of an easily extendable and well maintainable application is something you enjoy and take pride in responsibilities work in cross functional team deliver high quality work from design to production implement great functionality and stunning user experience take ownership of features working with the team and stakeholders work closely with other engineering disciplines focus on long term stability and maintainability requirements three years experience in developing for ios ideally with one or more applications in the app store solid wledge of objective and swift deep understanding of the ios platform full understanding and application of apple design principles and interface guidelines solid wledge of software design patterns and good architecture fluency with interface builder storyboard and auto layout familiarity with restful apis strong focus on code quality by applying clean code principles unit testing tdd bdd great skills in analyzing debugging and resolving defects experience with performance and memory tuning with instruments familiarity with continuous integration proficiency in code version ing with it open mindedness and positive personality can do attitude and great team player fluency in written and spoken english bonus android wledge bonus experience in web application ruby javascript etc bonus exposure to api design benefits the potential to change the way of learning for millions of users worldwide responsibility from day one and professional and personal growth potential within fast growing team participate in hack days tech logy brown bags lively startup atmosphere with friendly working hours long term prospects vibrant international team from over three six different nationalities excellent working conditions with location in the heart of the berlin scene great company benefits high end company bike fresh fruits drinks hack th on etc check out our jobs page our blog and our tech blog to get an impression of how we work at bab bel

description: people rely on us to get where they are going every day we take pride in our work we re committed to building the best app the best routing and the best data you ll take charge of quality at city mapper working with our team of engineers heroes designers and business folk to make our products more excellent we re constantly updating our apps we get embarrassed if bugs affect our users you ll be the expert on how to keep that from happening too often you ll curate feedback from our users and prioritize fixes for bugs that escape into the wild we re building new products you ll make sure quality is baked in the details are up to you you re the expert we re launching in lots more cities you ll help us make sure our app is the best from day one and you ll set up systems and practices so that gets easier each time resp on sibi lies detect breakage as early as possible work with the team and users to investigate problems set priorities for investigation and fixes build automation to scale quality processes advocate culture of quality contribute to product design requirements ideally you have passion for ui design keen eye for edge cases and experience with automated ui testing tools for ios and or android

description: book tiger is an online market place where customers can simply and easily find reliable and trustworthy cleaners for their home or small office we are young and fast growing startup situated in the heart of berlin our team is well experienced founders and core team from delivery hero com liefer held de and together with your help we like to break into the competitive home cleaning market we plan to launch new business unit in amsterdam in near future and are searching for managing director who will take on the exciting challenge of developing our business unit from scratch and work with us towards our vision of creating the most advanced and best product for our customers in the cleaning industry what the role entails from our new office in amsterdam you develop together with our founding team the strategy for our new business unit including budgeting and action plan for the upcoming launch you analyse the market our competition and our target audience recognise opportunities and build the new business activities accordingly you will set up and execute marketing and sales plan from scratch you will identify potential business partners and will be responsible for the contract negotiations you reach efficient business processes and continually opt mise these you carry the responsibility of the budget and report the progress of the new business unit to the founders on regular basis you build strong and successful team and are responsible for the management of personnel your profile successfully completed business degree an entrepreneurial mind set and determination with hands on get it done mentality excellent communication skills in both dutch and english several years of professional experience with strong focus on business development and or marketing desirably in the following areas new business development management hotel industry cleaning industry facility management an affinity for tech logy well structured and independent work ethic analytical thinking and strong interest in new business activities what we offer the rare opportunity of establishing new business unit from the outset and leading it to success steep learning curve with many challenges and great entrepreneurial experiences working with an ambitious highly talented and international team transparent business environment with direct action and can do attitude involvement in the overall success of the company by participating in the virtual share program from book tiger long with an attractive salary have we peeked your interest then apply today with your cv together with your earliest possible start date and your salary expectations please send your application documents directly to anna fish man head of hr anna book tiger com

description: outfitter is europe biggest personal shopping service and we have clear mission take the pain out of shopping for men do you want to have lot of freedom and deep insights as well as personal responsibility do you want to get to various personalities in great international team then become part of our team and support our company on the way to even greater success your tasks you initiate and realize online marketing campaigns for denmark in close cooperation with the other team members of the marketing department you support the planning and implementation of all social media activities via facebook twitter youtube insta gram blog etc you evaluate report and analyze respective actions you support the creation of ads landing page testing and targeting testing your profile you are either student or you recently graduated from your studies in eco mics communication or similar field you are up to date and how to manage the web you have great interest in men fashion and personal shopping you communicate in danish at native level and speak english fluently previous relevant internships are plus we offer an exciting workplace in dynamic and motivated team with low hierarchies dynamic company with short and efficient decision making processes air love life and work in the berlin startup scene intrigued then send your application with your earliest possible starting date your contact person is iris hay

description: with bab bel anyone can learn language whether on the go in the subway or at home on the of bab bel supports those who take joy in learning outside of work or school since its founding in two zero zero seven the company has grown to become the market leader in app based language learning in total bab bel offers one four learning languages from english to indonesian professional courses are steadily available via the bab bel website as well as on your smartphone or tablet at bab bel more than four zero zero team members from over three six different countries work hard to set standards for creating new learning experience talent acquisition at bab bel is more then just filling requirements task it is the understanding that we strategically build teams and drive our business with the talent we bring through our door it is the complete on going cycle of attracting sourcing recruiting and hiring employees this includes elements of employer branding outreach networking and relationship building with potential immediate and future candidates responsibilities develop and manage the full cycle recruiting process especially for technical roles partner with hiring managers to understand position specifications drive sourcing strategies to attract best of class talent identify qualify and pre screen candidates through agencies job boards social media channels associations and networking events create an exceptional applicant experience by going the extra mile make sure applicants are always up to date and receive prompt informative and personalized feedback identify the newest trends in tech recruiting and implement new strategies to attract top talent support our employer branding strategy requirements at least four years of experience in recruiting and active sourcing of candidates preferably in high growth start up familiarity with the challenges in international technical recruiting strong wledge of employer branding activities within the german tech start up scene ability to balance demanding hiring managers and candidate interests structured thinking and solution oriented attitude outstanding interpersonal skills and strong attention to detail proficiency with applicant tracking systems and social media networking tools bachelor degree in business studies or psychology focus on human resources is plus fluency in english german is considered plus benefits work at the center of one of europe hottest internet companies be part of highly dedicated lively and multicultural team broaden your perspective and learn new things every day informal working environment which cultivates ambition and originality start up mentality and attractive working environment in the heart of berlin

description: the person who fills this role will be part of the global procurement team and responsible for building and managing procurement within india you will think globally act locally your mission is to get the right deals from the right vendors at uncommonly optimised terms in highly expedited timelines in very well managed and tracked way from what we buy to how we pay here is some of what you and the team you build possibly two to five people will do what you ll do strategic planning results fully charged with defining and implementing spend visibility commodity management and strategic sourcing keeping executives in your region informed of key insights team management build and manage team and infrastructure to deliver incredible value risk management and cost savings facilities and it partner help quickly build cost effective offices and procure the right tech logy at the best price you will work with your team members that are deep category experts and other departments within uber to develop an efficient and effective supply chain telecom spend we re global with over million drivers on our mobile tech logy platform you ll team up with the tech logy and business teams to make sure we have the right deals at the right prices and help ensure well managed supply chain contracts you will negotiate as well as red line and draft commercial terms to support description: data center operations designs installs maintains the world largest cloud computing infrastructure we are looking for skilled data center technicians with passion for tech logy to help us expand our cloud to the next level amazon web services aw offers an exciting dynamic and challenging environment encouraging creativity and personal development while maintaining aw computing environments in secure scalable and cost effective manner to keep up with demand on both disk and network capacity we continue to expand our data centers in every region also our content delivery aw service cloud front has expanded its data centers presence by over five zero worldwide in the last one two months and are expecting to increase by similar number over the next one two months this requires talented people to build manage we hope it is you at amazon career progression is part of our environment we want you to progress if your career path is in systems network or database engineering software development or maybe aw support technical operations or perhaps project management we will create development plan to enable you to succeed reaching those goals this begins on day one come and work for the world most customer centric company the opportunity data center technician this role is unique opportunity to work in some of the most cutting edge data centers in the world amazon data centers are large scale high density centers where you will be working on changing the face of cloud tech logy in the region data center technician may be the primary point of contact for both internal customers for example network engineers systems engineers software developers database engineers technical operations and external customers hardware vendors contractors service providers among others responsibilities there is never dull moment as each day presents itself with different challenges some of the key responsibilities you will undertake are problem solving maintain high level of system reliability by prioritizing and resolving trouble tickets efficiently intermediate linux troubleshooting primary point of contact for all systems and network hardware problems technical troubleshoot technical issues on various platforms ranging from systems to networking remediation of physical layer outages both systems network remediation and recovery of physical power issues on racks participate in data center power and cooling incidents and escalate to relevant team operations meet two four seven shift and on call requirements and response during shift rotations install server racks in line with internal las data center point of contact for all high severity issues hardware diag stics and replacement of server and network devices and parts meet las for our customer up time enforcing amazons security best practices interact with third party vendors contractors contribute ideas to improve operational efficiency project management operational excellence deliver small to mid scale projects including data center rollout participate in team meetings for metric analysis and project status updates help build the world largest cloud infrastructure share wledge with other technical staff on the best practices related to all service owner issues write and enhance technical and operational processes and procedures data driven analytical approach to resolving problem understands operational metrics and drive actions to achieve the targets perform tasks needed with minimal supervision participate in global conference calls and report status to management tracking action items for cluster make team more effective by proposing and introducing process changes pro actively propose solutions to problems found and just report issue

description: the analyst position will support the svp of measurement analytics and insights group the group is responsible for creating new measures and analytics across various data source for viacom media networks specific responsibilities include work independently and with direction from the team manager on daily weekly quarterly executive audience reports identify and communicate trends and patterns in data through the use of excel and powerpoint collaborate with other team members to develop ways to enhance the communication of industry and company news and trends to our clients manage and coordinate research projects calendar management and meeting organization across different groups keep manager on track with regard to schedule arrange adjust travel as needed create and submit expense reports

description: outfitter is europe biggest personal shopping service and we have clear mission we build the future of menswear shopping our goal is to make men happy you want to have lot of freedom and deep insights as well as personal responsibility you want to get to various personalities in great international team then become part of our team as senior product designer and support our company on the way to even greater success your tasks create cutting edge web design for our product platform you cooperate closely with our experienced it product team work across platforms desktop tablet and mobile produce ui design work for our ios application you support the frontend web development department produce design work which op tim ze web performance you will produce designs based on wire frames and mock ups your profile you have completed your studies in communication design graphic design or similar you have at least three years of experience in web graphic design you are well experienced with photoshop illustrator and in design wledge in sketch in vision mock up balsam iq would be beneficial you are experienced in ui design and have strong understanding of ux design you have fresh ideas to contribute to our company you are comfortable working independently in high pressure environment you speak english fluently wledge of german is plus you are team player and love to think outside the box our offer high level of personal responsibility and great deal of creative freedom an exciting workplace in young and motivated team with flat hierarchy dynamic company with short and efficient decision making processes air love life and work in the berlin startup scene intrigued then send us your application with your salary expectations and possible starting date your contact person is iris hay please make sure to apply in english

description: tv advertising is being reinvented through big data predictive analytics and other audience segmentation tools that were previously only available in the digital world viacom vantage viacom data driven television platform is at the forefront of this reinvention of tv advertising and we are offering select few individuals the opportunity to join our team in this role you will be tasked with making the vantage client and partner experience competitive different at or for viacom by designing implementing and tracking the end to end experience of working with viacom vantage from on boarding through campaign management through reporting and analytics redefine vantage client on boarding to significantly reduce the time and touch points required to launch vantage campaign build automation framework to improve data sharing and transfers to support vantage campaigns define inputs variables and supporting collateral for vantage target segment definitions to smooth on boarding of client target segments define reporting rhythm for vantage clients including design and delivery of performance reporting throughout entire campaign create framework and scorecard for monitoring partner process throughout the year for all vantage partners

description: travel circus is seeking product manager to join the team we are looking for someone who is passionate about building great and in vative product you will be an integral part of the team and will work closely with others throughout our company to deliver the best possible product to our customers ideal candidates will have two years of experience as product manager working on online projects and passion for travel this position is full time and based in our great office in berlin things you will work on build and extend our platform services and booking systems serve as the conduit between our internal stakeholders and the software engineering team develop the vision of our products and convert ideas into product requirements define mvps milestones and guide the team through the development process coordinate implement and measure ab testing define kp is and goals to constantly measure and improve product development efforts analyse the market for new trends and explore new business opportunities what is in it for you the opportunity to influence the development of our platform and products be part of highly motivated and skilled team competitive skill dependent negotiable salary don hesitate to approach us skills requirements our ideal candidate has two years of product management experience especially with web based products demonstrated strong instinctual understanding of ux design and what users want passion for software and tech logy solutions that build simple and intuitive interfaces experience working in an agile development environment excellent visual verbal and written communication skills strategic visionary and analytical mindset ability to constantly re evaluate and improve can you recognise yourself if yes send your application including motivation letter cv desired salary and next possible entry date addressed to stefanie sass via our online application form maybe you are going to be part of the travel circus team very soon we are looking forward to get to you

description: we believe in cities in which all people are enabled to embrace the full potential of urban life that is why we are committed to creating mobility solutions that fully connect people to the city after obtaining several million usd in funding from german and silicon valley investors we launched our first product an electric scooter with portable batteries in two zero one four we are collective of smart creative individuals from all over of the world and are constantly on the lookout for like minded people to join us as our art director you are empowered to bring strong brand at the intersection of tech logy and lifestyle to life and define the public face of unu your profile experience storytelling concept creation brand communication digital design social media website assets newsletter digital ads print design brochures art direction collaboration with photographers videographer copy writing is required but plus worked three or more years with commerce companies ideally with startup management built and managed communication design teams before able to auto mously handle and execute frequent design requests from the team your role at unu build foster and efficiently manage world class communication design team collaborate with the xo to foster and constantly evolve our design language with the communication design guidelines work with multiple teams in the company to create the communication design across all touch points marketing sales web etc from concept idea tion to asset creation if you become part of the unu team you will get to enjoy the benefits of family like team beautiful office in at the factory berlin in kreuzberg company shares and an attractive salary please add your portfolio and ideally point out projects for each of the areas of required experience digital print art direction etc am looking forward to hearing from you apply for this job

summer two zero one four we are strong team of playfully inventive individuals who embrace urban life and strive for solutions that are perfect in simple way in two zero one five we are on the lookout for like minded people to join the team people who make difference grow beyond borders yourself as well as unu at unu we believe that expanding to urban areas is the key to our future success only through developing our business can we turn our vision of urban mobility into reality at unu you can actively contribute by supporting our business development team in bringing unu is ideas and vision on to the streets your responsibilities include but are limited to bring unu to cities in germany and other countries fast but rigorous recruit locally within many cities actively influence the structure and process of unu is expansion bring in your own creative ideas in interaction with all departments at unu enjoy work and develop yourself while feeling that you have an influence on unu is future your profile you identify yourself with unu is vision and culture you hold at least bachelor degree in relevant field you are creative but analytical mind you are positive person who wants to contribute constructively you can make decisions on your own as well as in teams you have strong cross cultural communication skills you are fluent in english ideally german third language is strong plus we are accepting applications on rolling basis please apply by uploading your cv or importing your linked in profile and writing short motivation letter we are especially interested in learning about why it is that you would like to become part of the unu vision if you have any questions please contact felix at felix unu motors com we are looking forward to hearing from you apply for this job

the code of your team mates setup up and maintain qa ci processes for android your profile hold bachelor degree in the field of computer science maths physics or similar posses minimum of two year of android development experience and has previously worked on an app that has one zero zero zero downloads in the google play demonstrate the ability to work in fast paced agile environment using description: at uda city our mission is to democratize education we aim to bring accessible affordable engaging and highly relevant higher education to the world we believe that education is longer limited to four years or four walls it lifelong pursuit tech logy is advancing rapidly and there is growing skills gap between job seekers and career opportunities that uda city is dedicated to closing through education to do this we are rethinking how education is made and delivered by empowering our students to advance themselves personally and professionally and help them land their dream job want to help what we are looking for solid understanding of how the internet works including http protocols tcp ip and dns solid experience developing restful services in java or python ability to write reasonable testable code and significant experience with common frameworks and libraries significant experience with variety of data store tech logies both sql and sql familiarity with highly scalable architecture concepts and some experience with public cloud environments like amazon web services google cloud platform microsoft azure etc experience or at least strong interest in developing android or ios applications you should also have passion for learning have previous teaching experience it is ok if it is acquired in an informal environment be good at breaking down complicated material and explaining it in way that others can understand be creative about presenting the material be it using drawings memes skits or something else have strong organizational skills and be comfortable tackling really big projects we believe that education is longer one time event but lifelong pursuit tech logy is advancing and there is growing gap in skills and the wledge needed to contribute to modern society we are rethinking how education is delivered to provide relevant affordable and lifelong learning opportunities we teach modern programming software development data science product design and entrepreneurship in an engaging accessible way that emphasizes mastery over memorization we are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company we do discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status apply for this job

description: the role we re looking for talented and passionate designer to join our seven person design team and contribute to our style guide iterate design changes and implement design principles across our entire platform as we scale as level ii designer you will have an impact on all aspects of the product lifecycle and you ll work to map user flows build high fidelity prototypes and oversee the development process you ll also have the opportunity to collaborate across different projects and teams from dashboard work flows for our student ambassadors to analytics tools for our product managers to occasional marketing campaigns and wherever else you like to take the lead here are some of the challenges you ll take on tackle complex problems and provide elegant creative solutions that respectfully balance both business and user needs create interactions across various media including web mobile and email and develop working prototypes in html css and javascript produce sketches flowchart mind maps wire frames mock ups prototypes and other designs as you iterate toward the best solutions to ux ui challenges lead usability testing with the product team for the ui that you will be building actively researching and staying abreast of interaction design and relevant tech logy trends mentor and train other members of the design team our ideal candidate has two years of professional experience designing web mobile or former user centered application for web based education gaming or commerce product strong design skills in photoshop and illustrator and other tools in adobe creative suite strong experience with rapid prototyping and professional experience with html css and javascript portfolio that showcases interaction and visual design projects user research and strong grasp of design principles strong understanding of the product life cycle as well as user centered design processes and methods bachelor or master degree in interaction design graphic design digital media or related field bonus points for some experience in css pre processors and angular js self initiated side projects in your portfolio experience in user research and usability test practical wledge of web ios and or android development what we re offering you industry competitive salary and stock options full medical coverage medical dental vision four zero one program to help you save for the future on a regular basis planned team events and outings free friday lunches and an endless snack and drink supply on site amenities including day spa full service cafeteria three miles of nature walk along the bay and free membership to seven five zero zero sq ft fitness center about us course hero is creating platform where students and experts can share and access great academic content they need to succeed at any time from anywhere today jillion of students take advantage of our educational resources including study guides flash cards and tutors we believe that improved access to wledge enriches lives and increases future opportunities tech logy is revolutionizing the way we learn and we re pull to providing individualized support to students everywhere to help them expand their academic wledge and professional skills our company culture is very open flat and transparent we succeed and learn together we ve tried hard to ready this pleasant and inspiring place to do creative work and it been working since we started out in two zero zero eight most importantly we seek to hire individuals whose personality integrity and passion for our business make our team better as whole we re growing fast profitable yes it true for four years and counting and looking for new team members to push us toward the future check out these videos to learn more about our company culture and our company mission

description: about us headquartered in new york and with offices in three states home team transforms the in home care and aging experience by providing clients with personalized care planning expert caregiver matching custom mobile tech logy and proactive care management to improve older adults health and well being while giving their families peace of mind in order to support the home team mission we are building team of experienced engineers to create software that will improve the lives of seniors caregivers and others in the home care ecosystem thither is work that is both straightforward and more fundamentally complex about you you are interested in only writing software but helping to build company you have the empathy and communication skills necessary to build strong relationships with colleagues on different teams to solve fundamental business problems you understand the fundamentals of computer skill you might have relevant degree from good school but maybe regardless you how to implement hash maps and heaps and trees you can discuss the difference between comprehensiveness first and depth first search you what big tation is and can tell us the running time of an algorithm in addition to wing the theory you also the practice you write clean code that is easy to understand instead of moving fast and intermit things you take your time to do it right you that when it comes to being great engineer it is all about the details you are interested in new tools and tech logies but you also found yourself dding your head little when reading choose boring tech logy you care more about getting the job done right than showing off you are comfortable starting with blank sheet of paper and creating working code from scratch you are intimidated and you will learn whatever new skills or tools you need to get the job done you want to do good work you take pride in what you do but you also want to go home at the end of the day you wonder little bit about the sanity of companies that expect their employee to live at the office you want to work with team of co workers that what they are doing you like being around people you can learn from and people that you can trust to do good job in their part of the world you want manager that keeps things running and can be mentor but boss that micro manages your day you could get job at google or facebook but do really want to work for big company on the other hand you might also be bit disillusioned with the startup world and wonder how many on demand mobile social rating companies the world needs you want to have meaningful positive impact on people is lives if any of this sounds like you then let is chat home team is going to be the next great new york technical school logy company and we would love to have you on our team home team is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity at our company we do discriminate on the basis of race religion coloring material national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status

description: trip gator is platform which creates personalised holidays and let user book with verified destination wholesaler at competitive price with trip gator experience guarantee internet has solved almost everything but leisure travel is still the same from last two three decades same stock itineraries and hassles to get or create personalised plan same process of get in touch with multiple agents and booking at higher price without any transparency and delivery guarantee it is but painful we have been through it and believe tech logy can solve the inefficiencies both on user and wholesaler side to make the whole holiday experience just hassle free but also eco mical we for us indians it is hard to believe great product can come out of indian soil question on qu or http www qu or com why are there so few product companies in india do take our word for it read here http www make use of com tag best trip planning organizing apps android how and why people outside india are feeling jealous because we serve to indian travellers only for geeks you must be wondering what is so difficult about putting personalised holiday plan together see google collaborating with nasa to use quantum computers to solve the problem https you tu be cm hd he ou three one zero are you excited conde nast traveller trip gator is more robust than most other apps available on the android store the itinerary recommendation engine works convincingly the app is being used by five zero users and created three five zero personalised itineraries the official itinerary planner of incredible india govt of india featured in nat geo traveller the all new trip gator allows you to make and edit travel plans with your friends and eco mic times financial express http world wide web trip gator com info page press we are based out of bangalore working hard to make travel planning and booking friction less and mobile app link http trp gr trip gator android app if you have infinite fuel do you think you can go one zero zero zero miles surely it your car engine which decides how far you can make it your job is to design develop such efficient engine to make the journey smoother yet the fastest one get it okay you will be poured upon by structured travel data monumental data ask almost anything which contributes to holiday planning booking you need to make pe intuitive planning engine efficient to the est make it sync use grid computing or cloud computing or clusters ever heard these terms please do read further make use of anything or everything to make system fast est yet robust without compromising on the cal ability you get it for sure qualifications eligibility criteria ec zero if data structures algorithms are like counting numbers on fingers al go expert two zero ec al go expert if you can prove that any degree in computer science from tier one college can take over your past work experience expertise two one ec expertise if you spend most of your time with linux terminal servers geeky ness two two ec geeky ness if you live on java or scala or on any other server side language we are talking about python here love ssl two three ec love ssl if you are fresher or have one year of experience and count bits ec two operating room count bits ec three you are eligible for the interview function count bits number count zero while number number number one count return count share your resume answering why you are eligible for the interview process additional information all your data will be kept confidential according to ee guidelines am interested

description: outfitter is europe biggest personal shopping service and we have clear mission take the pain out of shopping for men do you want to have lot of freedom and deep insights as well as personal responsibility do you want to get to various personalities in great international team then become part of our team and support our company on the way to even greater success your tasks you initiate and realize online marketing campaigns for denmark in close cooperation with the other team members of the marketing department you support the planning and implementation of all social media activities via facebook twitter youtube insta gram blog etc you evaluate report and analyze respective actions you support the creation of ads landing page testing and targeting testing your profile you are either student or you recently graduated from your studies in eco mics communication or similar field you are up to date and how to manage the web you have great interest in men fashion and personal shopping you communicate in danish at native level and speak english fluently previous relevant internships are plus we offer an exciting workplace in dynamic and motivated team with low hierarchies dynamic company with short and efficient decision making processes strain love life and work in the berlin startup scene intrigued then send your application with your earliest possible starting date your contact person is iris hay

description: with bab bel anyone can learn language whether on the go in the subway or at home on the of bab bel supports those who take joy in learning outside of work or school since its founding in two zero zero seven the company has grown to become the market leader in app based language learning in total bab bel offers one four learning languages from english to indonesian professional courses are steadily available via the bab bel website as well as on your smartphone or tablet at bab bel more than four zero zero team members from over three six different countries work hard to set standards for creating new learning experience recruiting at bab bel is more then just filling requirements task it be the understanding that we strategically build teams and drive our business with the talent we bring through our door it is the complete on going cycle of attracting sourcing recruiting and hiring employees this includes elements of employer branding outreach networking and relationship building with potential immediate and future candidates responsibilities develop and manage the full cycle recruiting process with focal point on marketing roles partner with hiring managers to understand position specifications drive sourcing strategies to draw best of class talent identify qualify and pre screen candidates through agencies job boards social media channels associations and networking events create an exceptional applicant experience by going the extra mile make sure applicants are always up to date and receive prompt informative and personalized feedback identify the newest trends in recruiting and implement new strategies to attract top talent support our employer branding strategy requirements at least three years of experience in recruiting and active sourcing of candidates preferably in high growth start up strong wledge of employer branding activities especially aimed at online marketing candidates ability to balance demanding hiring managers and candidate interests structured thinking and solution oriented attitude outstanding interpersonal skills and strong attention to detail proficiency with applicant tracking systems and social media networking tools bachelor degree in business or psychology focus on human resources is plus fluency in english german language skills are considered plus benefits work at the center of one of europe hottest internet companies be part of highly dedicated lively and multicultural team broaden your perspective and see new things every day informal working environment which cultivates ambition and originality start up mentality and attractive working environment in the heart of berlin

description: uber is expanding quickly throughout asia pacific and is looking for an experienced financial operations analyst to join our growing asia pacific team reporting to the head of finance india you will comprise cardinal to india finance operations to ensure payments to vendors driver partners are processed accurately and on time someone who doesn just plug and chug will be most successful in this role ideal candidate always asks the question does this make sense what will you do highly proficient with accounts payable process in voice processing compliance payment processing and travel expense reimbursement processing ensure vendor invoices driver payments and expense claims are paid accurately timely ensure sla metrics controls are met participate month year end close activities to ensure ap accounts are accurate and timely reconciled to gl work well with other functions to resolve issues related to ap support development of work instructions and process flows support participate internal external audit and related activities lead and support process projects related to procure to pay expense reimbursement areas inclination and desire to unceasingly improve the accounts payable and two process what you will need university degree or diploma level in accounting and or business discipline three years experience accounts payable banking payment process must have oracle one two wledge strong excel skills strong clear communicating skills on all level wledgeable of process improvement methodology perks employees are given lots of free uber rides each month make remainder we re just ther social web app we re moving real people assets and changing transportation for the future work with smart driven co workers in fun office

description: data center operations designs installs maintains the world largest cloud computing infrastructure we are looking for skilled data center technicians with passion for tech logy to help us expand our cloud to the next level amazon web services aw offers an exciting dynamic and challenging environment encouraging creativity and personal development while maintaining aw computing environments in secure scalable and cost effective manner to keep up with demand on both disk and network capacity we continue to expand our data centers in every region also our content delivery aw service cloud front has expanded its data centers presence by over five zero worldwide in the last one two months and are expecting to increase by similar number over the next one two months this requires talented people to build manage we hope it is you at amazon career progression is part of our environment we want you to progress if your career path is in systems network or database engineering software development or maybe aw support technical operations or perhaps project management we will create development plan to enable you to succeed reaching those goals this begins on day one come and work for the world most customer centric company the opportunity data center technician this role is unique opportunity to work in some of the most cutting edge data centers in the world amazon data centers be large scale high density centers where you will be working on changing the face of cloud tech logy in the region data center technician may be the primary point of contact for both internal customers for example network engineers systems engineers software developers database engineers technical operations and external customers hardware vendors contractors service providers among others responsibilities there is never dull moment as each day presents itself with different challenges some of the key responsibilities you will undertake are problem solving maintain high level of system reliability by prioritizing and resolving trouble tickets efficiently intermediate linux troubleshooting primary point of contact for all systems and network hardware problems technical troubleshoot technical issues on various platforms ranging from systems to networking remediation of physical layer outages both systems network remediation and recovery of physical power issues on racks participate in data centre power and cooling incidents and escalate to relevant team operations meet two four seven shift and on call requirements and answer during shift rotations install server racks in line with internal las data center point of contact for all high severity issues hardware diag stics and replacement of server and network devices and parts meet las for our customer up time enforcing amazons security best practices interact with third party vendors contractors contribute ideas to improve operational efficiency project management operational excellence deliver small to mid scale projects including data center rollout participate in team meetings for metric analysis and project condition updates help build the universe largest cloud infrastructure share wledge with other technical staff on the best practices related to all service owner issues pen and enhance technical and operational processes and procedures data driven analytical approach to resolving problem understands operational metrics and drive actions to achieve the targets perform tasks needed with minimal supervision participate in global conference calls and report status to management tracking action items for cluster make team more effective by proposing and introducing process changes pro actively propose solutions to problems found and just report issue

technician with passion for tech logy to help us expand our cloud to the next level amazon web services aw offers an exciting dynamic and challenging environment encouraging creativity and personal centers in every region also our content delivery aw service cloud front has expanded its data centers presence by over five zero worldwide in the last one two months and are expect to increase by similar number over the next one two months this requires talented people to build manage we hope it is you at amazon career progression is part of our environment we want you to progress if your career path is in systems network or database engineering software development or maybe aw support technical operations or perhaps project management we will create development plan to enable you to bring home the bacon reaching those goals this begins on day one come and work for the world most customer centric company the opportunity data center technician this role is unique opportunity to work in some of the most cutting edge data centers in the world amazon data centers are large scale high density centers where you will be working on changing the face of cloud tech logy in the region data center technician may be the primary point of contact for both internal customers for example network engineers systems engineers software developers database engineers technical operations and external customers hardware vendors contractors service providers among others responsibilities there is never dull moment as each day presents itself with different challenges some of the key responsibilities you will undertake are problem solving maintain high level of system reliability by prioritizing and resolving trouble tickets efficiently intermediate linux troubleshooting primary point of contact for all systems and network hardware problems technical troubleshoot technical issues on various platforms ranging from systems to networking remediation of physical layer outages description: we are unu we believe in cities in which all people are enabled to embrace the full potency of urban life that is why we are committed to creating the mobility solution that fully connects people to the city after obtaining several million usd in funding from german and silicon valley investors we launched our first product an electric scooter with portable batteries in late summer two zero one four we are strong team of playfully inventive individuals who embrace urban life and strive for solutions that are perfect in simple way in two zero one five we are on the lookout for like minded people to join the team people who make difference your mission join the core engineering team and help plough our wildest ideas into prototypes at unu you have the chance to join the bold development of coming generation of mobility dream up ideas discuss technical possibilities assess tech alternatives and then quickly make it work with your contribution the next unu generation will become more ripe smarter and personal we offer you the opportunity to work with an expert team in our lab in central berlin and develop tech logies for the succeeding level of mobility responsibility you will take part of the electrical engineering development of our scooter rapidly develop hardware prototypes launch projects from ideas to test on the street available at least two days per week skills you are skilled hardware maker former experience with prototyping platforms ard ui you have fun project hack you built to show us electrical engineering background is plus strong interest in electrical mobility apply for this job

description: the training team missionary post is to enable through learning we re small newly formed team started working together in august two zero one five based in san francisco and are applying our range of skills to develop stellar training for our customers partners and employees we re collaborative but still ask each other to own their respective projects passionate about learning but realize we must balance time to market with perfection open to giving and receiving honest feedback but we re always kind so that in the end we have the highest quality product own course development project that will require coordination with six one zero people and result in finished product tasks may include develop content on specific topics learning it well ugh to assess the scope of the training required on subject draft the instructional goals for courses based on the audience draft course outlines collect input from subject matter experts mes on the course audience scope objectives and outline write the first draft of course scripts text that will display on the lesson pages of course as well as directions for production propose ways to use interactive media in courses collaborate with the visual designer during course production execute user testing education skill requirements currently working on degree in design education english or psychology or any comparable degree must have strong writing skills clear voice in written work passion for teaching others resourceful approach desire to create self paced product training and an interest in visual design benefits of this role you ll get to work on interesting projects with great team in cool environment you re bound to learn ton in very short period of time and see what it like to enable others to succeed in their roles through with learning training and you ll have completed product at the end apply for this job

tch saas service zu or is chock full of game changers in vators and leaders who want to be part of the next wave of successful tech companies we re your usual hr department we re zeo success and we re at the center of company that drives one of kind success oriented zeo culture in which every zeo is empowered and has the opportunity to be wildly successful in case you re wondering we refer to our employees as zeo people who act as the ceos of their roles contributions and careers interested in being part of the team whose core values are zeo centric it leadership in vation and thinking big and is at the center of zu or most critical transformations want to actively contribute to transformative experience and do it with group of smart passionate talented and fun zeo yes then read on the
